toc.value: Fetching Data from the Blockchain Network
Transferring Crypto Tokens to another Account Address

frontMatter.title: How to Create A Cryptocurrency Wallet With Web3
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this article, we will be creating a React app to view your crypto balance and transfer tokens from your account to another account.

prev.title: How to Create A Cryptocurrency Token Using Smart Contract
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this article, we will be creating an Ehereum based cryptocurrency token using a smart contract and deploy it to a blockchain network.
